Paragraph: On the basis of the onset values of oxidation ( 0.10 V ) and reduction potential ( -1.17 V ) of the polymer , the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymer were calculated as -4.90 and -3.63 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of the onset values of oxidation ( 0.10 V ) and reduction potential ( -1.17 V ) of the polymer , the HOMO and LUMO levels of the polymer were calculated as -4.90 and -3.63 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| onset values of oxidation |
| onset values of reduction |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |
| oxidation potential |
| reduction potential |
| HOMO energy level |
| LUMO energy level |

The original paragraph mentions "onset values of oxidation" and "onset values of reduction" which can be considered as a single property with two values. However, for clarity, I have presented them as separate entities in the table. Similarly, "HOMO levels" and "LUMO levels" are also a single property with two values, but I have presented them as separate entities for the same reason. Additionally, I have added "oxidation potential" and "reduction potential" as they are the properties from which the HOMO and LUMO levels were calculated.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| LUMO levels |
| HOMO energy level |
| LUMO energy level |

The original paragraph mentions "onset values of oxidation" and "onset values of reduction" which do not clearly refer to material properties as they describe the potentials at which a reaction begins, rather than intrinsic properties of the material. Therefore, they have been removed from the table. The remaining entities, "HOMO levels" and "LUMO levels", are intrinsic material properties that describe the energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital, respectively.

These entities clearly refer to material properties, specifically the onset values and energy levels of the polymer.
